title:Pandapaxxy's Sundered Doctrine Weapon Breakdown
description:Based on https://www.reddit.com/r/sharditkeepit/comments/1j4ycgo/sundered_doctrine_weapon_breakdown/

// Unloved
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "Our first Strand burst hand cannon is super interesting. But mostly because Tear exists and is one of the best perks you can get. Subjugation is arguably the best origin trait as of late allowing the weapon to adapt to different enemies. Frenzy will boost your damage normally, but Paracausal Affinity works well if you use dark subclasses." Recommended MW: Reload Speed.|tags:pve,mkb,controller
dimwishlist:item=2485881870&perks=1840239774,1087426260,247725512,3215448563

// Unloved
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB / Controller): "While heavy burst hand cannons aren't high meta in this sandbox, they are still fun to use. Rapid Hit gives you some much needed stability when you hit your crits. Kill Clip is the only good damage bonus as it's instantaneous after a kill (I know you need to reload, but you should generally be doing that anyway)." Recommended MW: Range.|tags:pvp,mkb,controller
dimwishlist:item=2485881870&perks=3250034553,1885400500,247725512,1015611457

// Unsworn
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "Unsworn is basically the Sundered Doctrine version of Warlord's Spear. I think the unique perk to look out for is Detonator Beam as it's new, but Killing Tally or Target Lock are both great options too. Just a little bit more vanilla." Recommended MW: Reload Speed.|tags:pve,mkb,controller

// Unsworn
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB / Controller): "While I normally would say something about low ammo or something. Tear fixes that. Being able to Sever nearby enemies on a precision kill is huge for following that up into a kill chain. It doesn't do anything for that first kill, but it sets up for the second and third." Recommended MW: Range.|tags:pvp,mkb,controller

// Unvoiced
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "There haven't been too many shotguns that excite me outside of FILO from years past. But Redirectionâ€™s stealth buff paired with Vorpal Weapon or Bait and Switch is some huge damage. Now I know it's a lot of set up. But it's well worth it. Add in Subjugation for Exhausting the boss and you can stay close without much worry. Destabilizing Rounds in the third column is fun when running around with Frenzy to pop some Volatile with added oomph." Recommended MW: Reload Speed.|tags:pve,mkb,controller

// Unworthy
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / Controller): "Rapid Fire Frame scout rifles in PvP really need one of two perks, arguably together in order to feel phenomenal. Firmly Planted or Kill Clip. Unworthy has neither. Rapid Hit and Precision Instrument are fine but pale in comparison. Firefly will be nice for some AoE and Zen Moment is in the wrong column unless paired with Firefly." Recommended MW: Stability.|tags:pvp,controller
